reviewText: Excellent portrait of a man that tells both his story and the story of soccer from post-WWII Manchester, England to its growth in the U.S. from the pre-NASL days thru the NASL and beyond to youth and college soccer. You don't have to be a sports fan to enjoy this -- it is good for everyone.
Inspirational! Highly recommend seeing this film.  Dennis Viollet a true warrior both on and off the field.
Great film. I didn't know a lot about Dennis Viollet, but now I understand why the man is an absolute legend. Loved the interviews especially with Denis Law.

This DVD was bought for my husband who followed Manchester United as a child.  Many of the Busby Babes were his heroes amongst them being Dennis Viollet.  The DVD was enjoyed very much by him, and can recommend it to be a very good buy.
Excellent DVD. Exceeded my expectations. Great content.
